meanings.definition: (解剖学) 舌骨の角と関連する軟骨または骨
meanings.english_definition: (anatomy) A cartilage or bone associated with the horn of the hyoid bone.

etymology.value: Derived from the Greek words 'keras' (horn), 'hyoeides' (upsilon-shaped, referring to the hyoid bone), and the suffix '-al' (relating to).
